English.Text: An epic trial! At the first chance to speak, your crew engages in an extensive and thrilling retelling of its adventures, captivating the audience and the judges. They climb and rock benches to mimic past naval battles, embark the public by asking them timely and suspenseful questions, modify their tales according to the audience's whims. Their trespassing is made part of the story and as they retell the trial itself, the judges insist on letting them go. They leave as heroes!
